alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Poweshiek, northeastern Marshall, southwestern Black Hawk, Tama and southeastern Grundy Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Conrad to near Marshalltown to near Rock Creek Lake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Meskwaki Casino around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Toledo, Tama, Traer and Dysart. This includes Interstate 380 near mile marker 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central and northeastern Iowa.
